channel.title: machine learning on Harsh Darji
channel.description: Recent content in machine learning on Harsh Darji

item.title: Building a Disaster response Web-Application
item.description: In this project, we will be building a disaster response web application that will classify the message into different categories like medical supplies, food, or block road and direct them to the right organization to provide speedy recovery!

item.title: Building the SMS spam detector
item.description: In this blog post, we are going to develop an SMS spam detector using logistic regression and pySpark. We will predict whether an SMS text is spam or not Brace yourselves the spam is coming!!!
